Ancestry-Mouseling -- Male Mouseling Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d6 Strength: d4 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Diminutive (Tiny): Strength may not exceed d4
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4-2 Shooting: (agi) d4
Alchemy: (sma) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Survival: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Mild Mannered: -2 Intimidation
Amorous: -2 on Tests by a foe w/the Attractive feature
Outsider+: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 2
Features
Edges (1 points): Fey Blood Hindrances: Amorous; Driven; Mean; Pacifist Mouseling Features: Diminutive (Tiny); Low Light Vision; Outsider+; Phobia (Cats); Reduced Pace; Unimposing
Feature Notes:
Unimposing: Has Mild Mannered feature
Diminutive (Tiny): Armor cost and weight is 1/4 normal
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Outsider+: Has no legal rights
Phobia (Cats): Suffers -1 on Trait rolls in the presence of cats
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 4 (1) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Short Bow (-1 2d6 R12"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Diminutive (Tiny): -4 Toughness
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Short Bow Strength Penalty: -1 attack
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Diminutive (Tiny)-1: -4 all damage/Armor minimum strength is d4
Fey Blood: May take free reroll to resist enemy powers and spell-like effects
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
Arcana
Arcana Notes: Diminutive (Tiny): Powers inflict -4 damage
